channel.title: Animating Several Things
channel.description:
Right now I'm trying to figure out how to animate platebodies, platelegs, capes and monsters ...
I can't find anything in the npchandler ... anyone know why? Cause I do have animated graardor and stuff ...
Also I can't find a guide on how to animate plates, legs or capes anywhere ...
Can anyone help me? I'll rep++ if you do

item.title: Animating Several Things
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

You still stuck on both the npcs and items ?

Read full topic

item.title: Animating Several Things
item.dc:creator: @lord_killord lord killord
item.description:
@lord_killord wrote:

gerorge at least read it first …
I HAVE ALREADY ADDED THEM!! I JUST NEED TO ANIMATE THEM!!

Read full topic

item.title: Animating Several Things
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Thats the places in the client files where you add the new npcs and the new items.

lol you dont add custom items and npcs in the server files. You just edit the way the ncps attack etc in the npc.handler.

But if you want to make whole new complete custom items you need to have dat.maker or sometimes you need to also add a model to your model folder which is in the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Animating Several Things
item.dc:creator: @lord_killord lord killord
item.description:
@lord_killord wrote:

Naa, I know the armour animations are done in datmaker or metaseq somewhere … for the npc it cant be in class 5 cause it’s something server side apparently

Read full topic

item.title: Animating Several Things
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Hey,

To animate the armour you need to go to you client files once your in your client files you need to find class8.

Once in class8 find the item id and look at the code you can change the code arround.

And monsters are in class5.

I hope i helped.

Gl

Read full topic
